This game has been such an amazing experience. It has transformed me so much. Before i got this game, I was the most boring, lame, and very, very autistic. but with this game, I transformed so, so much. From russian mafia members teaching me how to use a AK47, to some indian guy stealing my account and me getting it back. Through all of the memories of this game, (mostly bad), i will never stop playing it. And about the game transforming me, it didnt do shit im still an idiot, but the game is good
